Hare Krishna Hare Krishna Krishna Krishna Hare Hare Hare Rama Hare Rama Rama Rama Hare Hare. Radha Krishna, krishna and his co. are ready to go to Barsana.

Radha Krishna episode 8/9

faith is the root of love. Faith and truth are two sides of the same coin. No faith, no truth and vice-versa. Faith allows us to find the truth, which ultimately makes us love this world. Love, unlove, and love again!

radha Krishna episode 9/10

Kansa deploys soldiers to burn Gokulam. Krishna saves all the people by taking them to a safe place. Then Krishna makes magic to make soliers believe that they burned Gokulam, along with Krishna. Kansa shows his pride and thinks he won over god's plan.

about

every object in JS has a prototype. Prototypes contain all the methods for that object type. When we create array, all the methods are not stored on array, but points to those on array prototype.

Radha

All the people of Gokulam goes to Barsana to stay low for some days. Vrishabhana and his co. welcomes everyone with ease. Krishna gets emotional as Radha chases him to punish him, which radha has promised in golokam. -Episode 14.

Krishna

All the people of Gokulam goes to Barsana to stay low for some days. Vrishabhana and his co. welcomes everyone with ease. Krishna gets emotional as Radha chases him to punish him, which radha has promised in golokam. -Episode 14 (2).
